pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Protective eyewear; Shoes plus socks

Active_Ingredients.name: Glyphosate, N-(phosphonomethyl)-glycine, as isopropylamine salt
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Inhibits an enzyme found only in plants and microorganisms that is essential to formation of specific amino acids

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product label with you when calling a poison control center, or doctor, or going for treatment.
